00015 function getImages($product) {
00019   $json = json_decode(fget('http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/services/search/images?v=1.0&q=' . urlencode($product) . '&rsz=large'));
00020   // Hack to get Indexes working
00021   if ($_GET['index']) {
00022     $currentIndex = (int) $_GET['index'];
00023   }
00024   else {
00025     $currentIndex = 0;
00026   }
00027   $prevIndex = $currentIndex - 1;
00028   $nextIndex = $currentIndex + 1;
00029   $i = 0;
00030   $getText = '?';
00031   foreach ($_GET as $item) {
00032     if (key($_GET) != 'index') {
00033       if ($i == 0) {
00034         $getText .= key($_GET) . '=' . $item;
00035       }
00036       else {
00037         $getText .= '&' . key($_GET) . '=' . $item;
00038       }
00039     }
00040     next($_GET);
00041     $i++;
00042   }
00043 
00044   $originalContextUrl = $json->responseData->results[$currentIndex]->originalContextUrl;
00045   $imgSrc = $json->responseData->results[$currentIndex]->tbUrl;
00046   $visibleUrl = $json->responseData->results[$currentIndex]->visibleUrl;
00047 
00051   $output = "<div id=\"prodimg\">";
00052   // Only display previous button if there are previous values
00053   if ($currentIndex > 0) {
00054     $output .= "<a href=\"{$getText}&index={$prevIndex}\"><img src=\"images/arrows/left.png\" alt=\"Previous Image\" title=\"Previous Image\" /></a>";
00055   }
00056   $output .= "<a href=\"{$originalContextUrl}\" target=\"_blank\"><img src=\"{$imgSrc}\" alt=\"Image of $product From {$visibleUrl}\" title=\"Image of $product From {$visibleUrl}\" id=\"prodimg\"></a>";
00057   // Only display next button if there are more images
00058   if ($currentIndex < count($json->responseData->results) - 1) {
00059    $output .= "<a href=\"{$getText}&index={$nextIndex}\"> <img src=\"images/arrows/right.png\" alt=\"Next Image\" title=\"Next Image\" /></a><br /><a href=\"aboutimages.html\" target=\"_blank\" onclick=\"popup(this.href, 200, 300); return false;\">About this image</a></div>";
00060   }
00061 
00062   return $output;
00063 }
